function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Discrepancies in RT-qPCR N1, N2, and N3 assays for water samples","Impact":"Inaccurate testing and potential false positive results for SARS-CoV-2 detection in wastewater","Mitigation":"Standardizing the testing methods and enhancing analytical sensitivity of the assays","Technologies":"Improved RT-qPCR techniques and primers/probe sets","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inhibitory effect of the matrix on RNA detection in wastewater samples","Impact":"Reduced accuracy of SARS-CoV-2 detection in wastewater and potential underestimation of viral loads","Mitigation":"Further study and optimization of RNA detection methods, including digital RT-qPCR","Technologies":"Digital RT-qPCR for more sensitive estimation of SARS-CoV-2 loads in wastewater","People":"Researchers, environmental monitoring agencies","Owner":"Environmental research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty regarding infectivity of viral particles in sewage and feces","Impact":"Potential risk to human health from SARS-CoV-2 transmission via wastewater","Mitigation":"Confirmation of infectivity and transmission routes through comprehensive studies and analysis","Technologies":"Cell culturing, viral isolation from stools, and molecular analysis techniques","People":"Public health researchers, environmental health experts","Owner":"Public health agencies, sanitation authorities"}]}
